src:
Kdo bo koga? Igra se spreminja, Danijel joka
Danijel, ki se je ravnokar kot zmagovalec vrnil iz arene, je v solzah. 
04 Nov 2019, 20:41 by S. N.



Danijel pogreša svoje domače. FOTO: Voyo



Dvojčka sta nova glava družine. FOTO: Voyo


Danijel in Marjana, ki sta zmagala v dvoboju, se počutita odrinjena. V težkih trenutkih Danijelu pomaga le hiša za utehe, kjer je planil v jok: »Še začeti ne morem. Zelo vas pogrešam vse po vrsti. Včeraj sem bil v dvoboju, izbral sem si najtežjega možnega nasprotnika, da bom šel domov, da bomo šli na svatbo. Pa ne morem izgubiti. Z najslabšo možno tekmovalko sva zmagala. Jaz sem super. Tudi če se jokam, sem super, ne skrbeti za mene. Malo sem shujšal, a to je bolj od dela.«
Boža je izpolnila obljubo in za glavo družine imenovala 21-letna dvojčka Jana in Tilna.
Potem ko ga dvojčka Jan in Tilen, novi glavi družine, nista določila za hlapca, pa je v hlevu našel pismo domačih. »Ostani zvest sebi in ostani iskren še naprej. Na koncu se to obrestuje,« mu sporočajo iz domačih logov.Sicer pa se karte mešajo, dvojčka kujeta malce drugačno taktiko in želita v dvoboj poslati Denisa (postavila sta ga hlapca, za deklo pa Adrijano). A kot kaže, bo izbor za prvega dvobojevalca negotov. 


Dvojčka sta nova glava družine. FOTO: Voyo
text:
Who will who? The game is changing, Daniel cries
Daniel, who has just returned from the arena as a winner, is in tears.
04 Nov 2019, 19:41 by С.Н.



Daniel misses his homework. PHOTO: Voyo



The twins are the new head of the family. PHOTO: Voyo


Danijel and Marjana, who won the duel, feel left out. In difficult times, Daniel is helped only by the comfort house, where he cried out in tears: “I cannot begin yet. I miss you all in a row. Yesterday I was in a duel, I chose the toughest possible opponent to go home to go to the wedding. Well, I can't lose. We won the worst possible competitor. I am great. Even if I cry, I'm great, don't worry about me. I've lost a little weight, but it's more than just work.
Boža fulfilled her promise and named 21-year-old twins Jana and Tilna as the head of the family.
After the two heads Jan and Tilen, the new heads of the family, did not designate him as a servant, he found a letter from his family in the barn. “Stay true to yourself and stay honest. In the end, this pays off, "the local logs tell him. Otherwise, the cards are mixed, the twins are cooking a little different tactics and they want to send Denis to the duel (they set him a servant, and for the girl Adriana). But it seems the selection for the first duel will be uncertain.


The twins are the new head of the family. PHOTO: Voyo
